channel.title: Lucid Group on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Lucid Group on FinanClub

item.title: 1133 LCID
item.description: score:1133 Chances: Lucid Group is reporting quarterly results next week, which may bring insights into the company’s performance. Former Dow CEO and current Lucid board member, Andrew Liveris, weighing in on the EV maker’s plans could provide valuable perspectives. Lucid Group’s move into China’s EV market and expansion in the Middle East region might offer growth opportunities.
